title: D2 Midlaner looking to build a team.
body:
Hello, I'm Mathemagician and I'm a D2 Midlaner looking to build a team.

ROLES CURRENTLY AVAILABLE:

SUPPORT

Requirements:

Dedication to the game and a willingness to invest time to improve.

A rank above Diamond 5.

To be available most days from around 4pm-10pm and to be available on weekends (for tournaments and such).

Application:

IGN:
ROLE: (looking for a top only atm)
CHAMPION POOL:
HOURS AVAILABLE:
TIMEZONE:

Send me a message at Mathemagician if you want to talk about applying.
